name: Puzzle Kind
description:
Experience the thrill of the best puzzle game.
*************************
Help the cute little witch who is learning to cast spells advance through her magical world by solving the puzzles presented by the powerful Wizard!

***********
see image and hear sound and remember place to find same image and sound .

this game is endless , all level is endless .

Time to solve each page is important so you find best score with solve page faster and faster.
